message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper deals with continual learning, which is a subfield of machine learning. The paper evaluates different scenarios and proposes a categorization of them. This suggests that the paper could belong to the sub-categories of machine learning (cs.LG), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), computer vision (cs.CV), natural language processing (cs.CL), or neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE). Among these, cs.LG is the most likely category as the paper deals with learning algorithms and their evaluation. The other categories are also possible as the paper deals with computer vision and natural language processing tasks.
